Serial Monitor

A serial debug monitor. More...

#define BUFLEN   32

Functions

void monitor ()

Detailed Description

A serial debug monitor. 

 #include <monitor.h>

The monitor program shows internal system-parameter and allows manipulations of variables

Note:
Based on Atmel Datasheet for Atmega128, Nov. 2006
Author:
Rainer Ostendorf
